meanings.definition: A medical instrument used to examine the interior of the stomach.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a gastroscope to look inside the stomach.
meanings.sent2: The gastroscope helped the medical team see the inside of the stomach clearly.
meanings.sent3: The gastroscope peeked into the stomach and found a surprise!
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a gastroscope, exploring every corner of the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The gastroscope revealed the secrets hidden within the stomach.

meanings.definition: To examine the stomach using a gastroscope.
meanings.sent1: The medical team will gastroscope the patient to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often gastroscope patients to ensure their stomach health.
meanings.sent3: He decided to gastroscope his dinner before eating it, just for fun!
meanings.sent4: She likes to gastroscope situations before diving in, to avoid surprises.
meanings.sent5: The detective gastscoped the crime scene for clues.
